website_summaries.verdict: If you need extra length without sacrificing stability, these shepherd's hooks are hard to beat. Tall, sturdy, and durable.
pros: Height works well for almost any purpose, including bird feeders and bug zappers
Powder coated wrought iron construction is attractive and weather resistant
cons: Only comes with 2 hooks per set

customer_reviews.title: you could pole dance on this bad boy 😂🤣
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness !!! I was pleasantly surprised by the qualiity of this item. The pole is so strong...you could pole dance on this bad boy 😂🤣
customer_reviews.author: Dreeno

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hummingbird feeders.
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Sturdy and beautiful. Used them both for hummingbird feeders. One in ground, one in a big pot.
customer_reviews.author: Mona Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Nice construction
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation. Pretty. Just wish I'd ordered the taller ones. But I still like it and my hummingbirds have found it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Paint quality not the greatest but served its purpose and received a partial refund for the defect so in all would buy again. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: DiverD

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shepherd hook poles. They are very sturdy and the design is beautiful. My husband left me know that I could buy cheaper ones at another store so I looked and they were not nearly as nice as these. The design was not as nice and they seemed to be thinner. I love hanging my wind chimes on these and will be buying more next year.Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: nana 7

customer_reviews.title: Two for the price of one!
customer_reviews.text: I really love my hooks they are very nicely made. I one thing I would say is if you don’t want something to hang close to the ground I would get taller hooks. This being said it is because my bird feeder is long so long but it is still working the squirrels have not bothered it and the birds love it! I am going to use my other hook to put beside a bench I have by the lake to hang a light on!
customer_reviews.author: Boxer3mom2

customer_reviews.title: Nearly perfect - Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: These poles are very heavy duty, and, once placed in the soil they will stand up to heavy winds. The 2-post base is easy to embed into the soil and the tines are long enough that the bottom horizontal bar just needs to touch the ground surface (I would suggest adding rocks or harder material in the holes they are placed in if you have very loose soil). Even the curled top hook is effective and easy to attach your feeder (or light, or whatever you are hanging on it), and it keeps the feeder securely attached. My hummingbird friends visit the feeder on these poles regularly. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bhurgh

customer_reviews.title: Great as a wreath holder.
customer_reviews.text: We use these to hold Christmas wreaths in the graveyard. Very solid, deep stakes so they don’t fall over, and when they use the weed eater it doesn’t get destroyed.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny LeJeune

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love the product. I am using it to hang my hummingbird feeders which are made of plastic. The birds come to feed regularly at the feeders and this height of the shepherds' hook is perfect. I was sad to notice that one of the hooks has developed rust on it. I quickly sprayed some oil on it hoping it would go away. But I can still see it. For an expensive product, I had hoped it would be of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy (thick steel) and no issues with a bird feeder ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy (thick steel) and no issues with a bird feeder falling off in some recent strong storms. The only thing that would make this nicer is if the bottom was spiked so it would go in the ground more easily. We have a bit of a clay heavy back yard and it was a big effort by my husband and I to get this in the ground because the diameter is so big and flat. We had to do what you might with a screw and "pre-drill" a hole in the ground to get us started. But it is definitely in there now.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: It looks like it should
customer_reviews.text: Put them in garden today. One is for holding a large basket of pansies the other for a bird house holding seed. They sure look well constructed and have a strong ground piece. We see if it holds up to severe rain storms and bouts of strong wind. It looks like it should. Price was great compared to stores in my area.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not everything can be "heavy duty"
customer_reviews.text: Thought these were heavy duty, but not quite. I am using both hangers to hold one flower pot and they were both bending. I had to reinforce both with rebar -- another $36 on top of the cost of this product. In my second picture, the rebar is straight, but it's the hangers that are bending. Not happy
customer_reviews.author: T. Dinnall

customer_reviews.title: Missing/bad tubes.
customer_reviews.text: The feeder arrived with three tubes but none of them was the center tube. All tubes were threaded on only one end, making it impossible to join them together. I had a tap and die set, but the thread is an odd 21mm size, so rather than return it I bought 21mm tap and threaded the rod. If you don't have access to a 21mm tap set I would avoid this feeder, otherwise you will be returning it. Once I fixed this manufacturing oversight, I kind of like the feeder.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy A Roaix

customer_reviews.title: Short but wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I had two of these that were much taller but the issue with them was they would bend from the weight of my planters. I accidentally ordered these thinking they were just as tall as the ones I was replacing (2 foot difference) - my error though ended up being a blessing. My planters are very heavy especially after I water them which made the original hook buckle even more. The shorter height means it doesn’t need to struggle to keep my plants up. I do like the sight lines taller ones provide but where I placed these is fine with these shorter ones.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Shorter than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Guess I didn't really consider how tall 65 inches is (my bad) but it's a lot shorter than I had expected. Still works fine for a bird feeder. The birds still come to eat the seed. Luckily i dont have many or any squirrels so that's not an issue. But the main benefit is that the bird feeder has never come off and that's primarily why I bought this particular item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, shoddy shipping
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy, tall, and attractive. Everything I was looking for. Sadly they were shipped loose in a box with no wrapping at all so arrived dinged. I could hear them clanging against each other as I carried them inside so I'm sure they banged around all the way here. A little wrapping to protect them from each other would have earned a five star review. They are good enough for what I'm using them for but if you are looking for them to arrive in perfect condition, find another vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Zach's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Strong solid hooks
customer_reviews.text: These are medium-tall shepherd hooks that can easily be sunk into your lawn or garden area. We hung some lightweight lanterns from them, and after 2 windy days, all is well, no visible movement from the ground. One thing we liked was the extra swirl on the hook part which assures us that the lanterns won't accidentally slip off in a strong gust.
customer_reviews.author: David E. Goldweber

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but don't overload even though 1/2* steel
customer_reviews.text: These are just what the amateur outdoor stylist in me wanted. Just don't overload these with a heavy load of soil and roots. I chose a pair of blue oval plastic pots with what is currently yellow foliage. If I were to re-engineer these, I would make the below-ground depth deeper still.
customer_reviews.author: Knowlengr

customer_reviews.title: hard to get into the ground
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this height because I'm short but they turned out to be too short cause the feeders hang down too low. they were really hard to get into the ground. I'm a tiny older woman with hand issues so; I got the ground really wet and then pushed them in the best I could and then used a hammer. they will be better for my solar lanterns than for the bird feeders so not a total loss.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa M. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing more frustrating than waiting 4 weeks to receive the two shepherd hooks you need for a project and then the package finally arrives and inside of it is one hook, not two. I'm not the only one this has happened to according to the reviews. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Constance Spry

customer_reviews.title: The look I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want the plain ones, so these were really my only other option. These fit my 14 inch planters nicely. No room to spare, but they fit and can support them fully filled. I'm pleased with how they look.
customer_reviews.author: Robin K

customer_reviews.title: Look great in the yard
customer_reviews.text: I use them to hang a humming bird feeders and a bird bath. They look good in the yard without being gaudy or overly eye catching and that is what I wanted. The metal is not to thin and coming by the U.S. post office for me they did not bend While in transit. They are sturdy in the ground with the two spikes in normal yard dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Rossi

customer_reviews.title: Swing and a miss
customer_reviews.text: Poorly packaged. Arrived banged up and partially opened. The paint application appears to be poor. The prong which supports the hook is a smaller diameter than the rest of the hook. The height is just about right to hold a hanging Dog bowl for a Great Dane. It is a little low for plants of bird feeders.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewbert

customer_reviews.title: This was fantastic for what I needed!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this Shepherd's Hook to hang a Christmas Star over my Nativity Scene for outside. It is the absolute PERFECT height for what I need. Very Sturdy, All one piece, Pretty thick metal. I wired the star to the top and put another wire at the bottom point of the star to keep it from swaying so much. Looks VERY NICE from the road!
customer_reviews.author: S. Clarke

customer_reviews.title: These are sturdy and attractive
customer_reviews.text: This was tall enough to place next to a large bush I have in the front of my house, and I could see the lantern on it. These are sturdy and attractive. I like being able to get two in a pack, since I needed hooks in more than one area. After purchasing the first set, and liking them so much, I will be purchasing another set, they really add a nice design element to the front of my house.
customer_reviews.author: tallgal

customer_reviews.title: Never buy a thin hook again, these are great
customer_reviews.text: I used to have some generic thinner shepherd's hooks for decorative items and bird feeders. They would bend too easily when moving. These hooks are beautiful and I love how much of a curl is offered BECAUSE when there is high wind, most of my items do not swing their way off! I have bought some to give to a relative because they are great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, supporting prong broke off right away
customer_reviews.text: The supporting stake/prong broke off the main body of this hook after just three pushes trying to get it into the ground. I ordered a shorter version of these hooks before (the 3 foot 2-pack) and they were sturdy, so I was hoping to get the same quality again. No such luck: if it wasn't expensive to ship them back I would, these are basically useless now.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Teige

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Poles
customer_reviews.text: Like it's advertised, these poles are thicker and stronger than your average pole you find in a nursery, etc. However, they are still not tall enough for a birdhouse. Much too short for that. Poor birdies. Too large to send back, but I guess that's my fault for not knowing what 65 inches really looks like.
customer_reviews.author: Camie

customer_reviews.title: Great looking hooks.
customer_reviews.text: I love the design of this hook. So cute. I’ve had them out for a few months now with no issues. They've survived Central FL summer monsoons & severe thunderstorms. The local mockingbirds like to sit on them too. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: EngineeringMom

customer_reviews.title: purchased another 2
customer_reviews.text: I already had 2 of these from last year but love them so purchased another 2. They are taller than most and are very sturdy and the inside curve prevents wind from taking off with my bird feeders and hummingbird feeder.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I have these on either side of my driveway with hanging lamps. I don’t know how well they will handle the hurricane-force winds that some times comes through my area, which is why I only gave it 3 stars for durability and sturdiness. I’ll update this post after the next hurricane-force winds that barrel through.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad that I received these
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad that I received these. I tried to cancel order because I thought they would be to small but it was to late to cancel. The hooks are perfect for my Boston Ferns. Not only are they very sturdy they are so much prettier than the hooks I have purchased in the past. Thank you for being an honest and reliable seller/ Love these and will definitely buy again from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: mysty

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Basic instructions because they lean over. I saw an outdoor wooden lamppost on a large diameter pipeline base it was stick straight up. I’m not complaining these Shepherds Hooks are high quality well made and nicely finished
customer_reviews.author: CARMINE RICCA JR

customer_reviews.title: Great shepherd hooks
customer_reviews.text: Perfect height. Love the design. Looked for these in a few local stores. For some reason no one had any. I ordered the shorter ones and they were not what I wanted. I communicated this to the supplier. They were apologetic for MY mistake and sent me another set of these. I am so grateful and appreciative of their customer service. They went beyond what I expected. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Only 44” high for hanging
customer_reviews.text: Only 44” from ground level to hanging level, too short for bird feeders. The quality seems good, and I like the sturdiness of the larger diameter tubing but I’m returning due to the shortness.
customer_reviews.author: AOPAaviator

customer_reviews.title: Tall shepherd hooks
customer_reviews.text: I am using them to hold solar light bulbs. I had to stand on a chair to loop the light bulbs over them. I did want them taller because I don't want people hitting their heads on them. They are fine, they seem to be heavy and sturdy. I like them and would buy them again
customer_reviews.author: M. Merriken

customer_reviews.title: Construction Quality is bad
customer_reviews.text: I installed the first one right away with no issues. Then a couple of weeks later I went to installed the second one. When I hit the ground stake of the second unit it immediately broke. I kept forgetting to write Amazon about this issue and now it's two days past the return date. Amazon use to be more generous with their return date.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Elam

customer_reviews.title: Tall and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These poles are very sturdy. They were easy to push into the ground. They hold my large hummingbird feeders with no problem. They are tall enough so the cat can’t lay under it and easily grab one of my little friends.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t receive them, received shorter ones, which I’m ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t receive them, received shorter ones, which I’m using. I want my money back, not all of it of the money. Just the difference between the two.
customer_reviews.author: Mary ReadAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong version
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the version with the inside hook like the picture shows and is listed in the description. I received the other version with the outside hook. The product was nice but I specifically ordered the inside hook version because I feel it would be better in the wind. I have returned the ones I received and don't plan to reorder because I don't want the same thing to happen. They are a pain to return because the box is very long and not very sturdy. The box was coming apart when I received it. The product would have been great if I received what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L Mason

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: These shepherds hooks are high quality and very nice looking. These perfectly serve the purpose for which they were ordered as they hold a hummingbird feeder and a hanging basket of flowers at my mothers gravesite. I’m totally pleased with the product and the seller and I have corresponded and she has been fabulous to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Seems strong. Had to do some hard pounding on the support bar (using a small piece of 2x4 to cushion the hammer blows) to get it deep enough into the ground (solid clay) and it took that without damage. Seems to be well-finished against the weather, but I'll wait a year before giving it a 5th star.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty!
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit that I was a little leary of ordering these as you can never really tell the quality from pictures. After receiving these Shepard hooks and seeing them in parting, they are really strong and well made. Like other reviewers have mentioned they are heavy duty. Wish I had known about these before. Will order more for my garden.
customer_reviews.author: Serduszko

customer_reviews.title: Tall shepherd hooks!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the actual height but am pleased! Very substantial, too. I have several hooks of varying heights in my small backyard garden, so adding this 65 inch hook is a nice change. I have hung a large hummngbird feeder to the hook and using soft wire will soon add some of my Tillandia plants!
customer_reviews.author: Janet D. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Shorter than expected. 54" when installed. Not 65"
customer_reviews.text: Shorter than described. When installed, the posts are 54" tall ( 4.5 ft) and not 65" tall ( 5' 5" ). The coating is spotted in most of the surface and there are rubbing spots from the two sliding against each other, so I am imagining it will that after a season. It'll work but not quite as well as we are led to believe.
customer_reviews.author: Vrock

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Serves their purpose, but don't move it because one of mine broke when I was pushing it into a new location after a month of being outside. It broke at the junction where the stabilizing l- bar attaches to the main pole. Useless now.
customer_reviews.author: TanyaBo

customer_reviews.title: Less that 5ft tall when in the ground
customer_reviews.text: These are very sturdy, but I wish the description stated the 65" includes the bracket that good into the ground. They are much shorter than that when put into the ground. Within a month they have started getting rust spots.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Theses shepherd hooks work great for hanging hummingbird feeders!
customer_reviews.text: These shepherd hooks are very durable and stable when inserted into the ground. I used both to hang hummingbird feeders in our yard and the hummingbirds seem to like where their feeders are now located!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Sturdy Hooks
customer_reviews.text: These hooks were exactly what I needed to feed hummingbirds. I was able to place them in areas where I knew the birds would visit. I moved them several times until I found the perfect spots for them. They were an excellent buy and a very good product. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: arsinoe

customer_reviews.title: Nice,  but arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: These were not packaged well at all. The hooks were taped together and placed in a box with no padding or paper. They arrived scratched and chipped. Without the outer black coating, they will rust. Returned the hooks.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to place at my Mother's and Sister's graves. They are very thick, heavy and well made. Now I can place things on these and not on the ground and I love that. They should last for years and years if not stolen.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to hang bird feeders in my flower beds. They are sturdy and have held up well over the summer. The height is perfect, the feeders have never slipped off the hook during storms and they are not experiencing and rust despite having a very rainy summer. Def recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected quality
customer_reviews.text: The Shepherd's Hooks arrived on time with no scratches. They are heavier than I expected and will no doubt last a long time. They are perfect for hanging the basket of flowers and Hummingbird feeder. Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because the design was different than what you normally find on a shepherd's hook. These are strong and beautiful. We are using them to hold hanging flowers placed along a fence. These are just under 5 1/2' tall but there are other sizes available from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: L. M. Hoak

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful plant hook
customer_reviews.text: I really like these hooks. They are well made and very pretty. They are holding really heavy strawberry baskets right now and doing a great job. And our soil is a red clay which is a very loose soil and the hooks are holding up really well haven’t moved an inch. So happy with my purchase exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work
customer_reviews.text: The hook works well. If course it is a metal pole with a curve in the end so what could go wrong? The pole is a little shorter then I expected but it still works fine.
customer_reviews.author: ohio 45459

customer_reviews.title: Good solid shepherd hooks
customer_reviews.text: We've been using these for the entire summer and they have worked great. They're heavy duty and should last.
customer_reviews.author: wfl

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Shepherds Hooks
customer_reviews.text: I'm using these hooks for the many birdfeeders I have in my bird sanctuary. The box was so torn up it looked like it was too heavy for the deliveryman. It was just awkward not heavy at all. The quality is outstanding & I would recommend them to anyone! Box on left UPS, box on rt FedEx.
customer_reviews.author: KAREN THEISS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to hold my solar powered dragonfly lights and they work perfectly. I definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Akasha

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Product description states it is rust resistant, however the item was rusted from inside out, broke immediately out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: this product is really good quality. this time I buy two large items
customer_reviews.text: I am a second time buyer,this product is really good quality.this time I buy two large items .put at the front area of my house. I am very happy to have this and it is bring more emotional appeal to my life.
customer_reviews.author: zhon

customer_reviews.title: Probably why they recommend for hummingbird feeders
customer_reviews.text: These were to short for my usage plus the hanger part is directly under the curve at the top. Birds sit up there and their poop ends up on the feeder. I probably should have been aware of this. Probably why they recommend for hummingbird feeders. Other than that the quality was really good.
customer_reviews.author: G. Matta

customer_reviews.title: Super quality
customer_reviews.text: I kind of messed up on this order...I wanted something 65 " out of ground, and it was considerably shorter when I buried it BUT I love the quality of these and I am going to use them for plants. they are very sturdy, and solid. will order taller ones.
customer_reviews.author: TeaLadyTeresa

customer_reviews.title: Shepherd hooks a good bargain
customer_reviews.text: I’m using the hooks to display my flowers pots and haven’t had any problem of the hanging basket or hooks to fall to the ground even with the wind and rain hitting pretty hard during this spring season
customer_reviews.author: PBanks

customer_reviews.title: good quality for the price for two...
customer_reviews.text: Two singles allow a more interesting arrangement than just a plain double hook...
customer_reviews.author: J. Hartmann

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size/height for refiling the feeders. Solid wrought iron snd did not bend when hammering a bit to get into the ground.
customer_reviews.author: grannytwo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much! They were easy to put in and they look amazing in my backyard garden!
customer_reviews.author: KJulia

customer_reviews.title: Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful hook, well made , very strong and looks like it will hold up extremely well on the rare occasions we get wind here. Which is very important to me , as I do not want my humming bird feeders or bird house to go flying off the balcony. I am looking forward to viewing the “animal kingdom” that flys by for a few minutes each day:))
customer_reviews.author: Linda Perez

customer_reviews.title: looked better, and strong
customer_reviews.text: These were half the price of similar hooks at lowes and HD, looked better, and strong. The metal is every bit of .5" and they go into the ground easily. I hung a birdhouse and a bird feeder and they didn't move at all. Much, much, much better deal than what lowes or HD offers. Shipping was fast too.
customer_reviews.author: darin fischer

customer_reviews.title: Shorter than you think
customer_reviews.text: They are very nice and sturdy. Holds my hanging baskets with no problem. I probably should have realized that 65" tall was NOT the height of where my basket hook would be. I should have gotten the tallest ones to really fit my flower basket needs. Suggestion to Seller: Please clarify the distance from the ground to the bottom of the hook. It would help other buyers.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Was going to return them because reviews said they are short but decided to keep them because they are good quality. However they are not packed well at ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these as a gift. Was going to return them because reviews said they are short but decided to keep them because they are good quality. However they are not packed well at all and are slamming against each other in box which caused a big chip in the protective coating. These need to be wrapped and better secured in the box so they don’t get damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Charney

customer_reviews.title: The hooks seem to be sturdy. My hanging planters are a little lower than ...
customer_reviews.text: The hooks seem to be sturdy. My hanging planters are a little lower than I was expecting but I failed take into account the curve of the hook so that's my own fault. The curve seems to add to the sturdiness too. The hooks look as nice as expected as well. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Quiggle

customer_reviews.title: Soooo sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I love the hooks and definately will buy more soon. They are very durable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Torres

customer_reviews.title: Solid and Aesthetically Pleasing!
customer_reviews.text: We had this hooks in our front yard for a while, with no problems (bird feeders were hanging, and never slipped off). However, we will be doing some substantial outdoor remodeling, so I am sure they will be a great addition to our porch!
customer_reviews.author: James Alexander Mullen

customer_reviews.title: nice product
customer_reviews.text: they are the best. I have purchased 2 sets. they hold up to the weight of a heavy watered plant.
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Strong and attractive. They are strong and attractive, except at the weld point. One of these shepherds hooks broke at the weld point and is now useless to me. I expect $16.50 to be refunded to me to compensate for my loss. Thank you. Ami Francesconi
customer_reviews.author: Ami Francesconi

customer_reviews.title: Make this quality in taller heights
customer_reviews.text: All features are met and very sturdy and attractive but even though I questioned about height before and when planted my husband said not tall enough for what he wanted. Kept and used elsewhere won't order more as I hoped. Best specs available but need taller ones.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Etter

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: Have a long extension cord (25ft) and used these to hold it off the ground as I wrap the cord around the fence to my bug zapper. Makes it look good to.
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: Very short poles
customer_reviews.text: They're high quality poles, but they are more for enjoying a basket of flowers or hummingbird feeder at a seated height. I thought they would be 65" tall once they're in the ground. Not so. I'm 65" tall and these poles are not as tall as I am.
customer_reviews.author: JKF

customer_reviews.title: Look good but hard to install
customer_reviews.text: Look good, but Are impossible to push into the ground here—we have clay soil. I wish the bottoms of the pole were pointy instead of flat. I ended up installing one in my raised garden bed because the soil is soft enough to push it in.
customer_reviews.author: Susan G.

customer_reviews.title: The birds love it
customer_reviews.text: My mom wanted an additional place to hang a hummingbird feeder so that she had a better view of the birds. This hook was just the thing as we could put the feeder up anywhere that worked.
customer_reviews.author: mconnerpt

customer_reviews.title: Stake ends need to be sharp points
customer_reviews.text: The ends of the stakes that penetrate the ground need to be pointed, not flat ended rods. Using your foot to seat the rods causes a bend in the rod unless your soil is very soft which is unlikely in my region.
customer_reviews.author: Rossman

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality hook. Since the end turnoff holding is under and not turned out I think this makes it even more sturdy. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: School Girl

customer_reviews.title: Look great with my bird feeders.
customer_reviews.text: The are very nice and, they are sturdy. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Crincoli

customer_reviews.title: Hummers use it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put into the ground and reachable to refill feeders
customer_reviews.author: Laura M

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money but wish they were taller.
customer_reviews.text: These hooks are very sturdy but they are not as tall as I expected them to be. Once in the ground they are maybe 3 1/2 feet. Too small for what I originally wanted them for but I can still use them for flowers. I wanted them for my bird feeders. They are very sturdy and well built.
customer_reviews.author: anita marcotte badeau

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and functional for hanging bird feeder.
customer_reviews.text: The shepherd hook is well made, sturdy and a good weight for supporting a hanging bird feeder holding 2 lbs of bird seed when full. The two prong base allows for good stability in the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Florence Ouzts

customer_reviews.title: Installed product is shorter than description
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and nice looking. One thing to understand before ordering: it is 65 inches long in its entirety. Once in the ground it is shorter...closer to 55 inches...because of the ends that stick in the ground. If I'd realized this I may have kept shopping around.
customer_reviews.author: Josie4

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with the way this product was made, it’s sturdy and eye appealing. I did think that it was taller for my yard. I’m using it for wind chimes, which I have posted around my yard.
customer_reviews.author: Sicily gal

customer_reviews.title: Right height.
customer_reviews.text: I like these because they are the right height for me to.hangs plants and be able to take care of them as I am disabled. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: auntdonna

customer_reviews.title: Large, sturdy shepherds hooks! Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shepherds hooks, to hold very heavy, hanging flower planters! Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Camperlady7

customer_reviews.title: Broke off
customer_reviews.text: The bottom part broke off when trying to put it into the ground, so now I only have one. The other one was ok.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, good looking and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Shepherds Hook is the right height to hang my hummingbird feeder. it is sturdy and looks good in the garden. Was concerned about the part of the hook that goes in the ground, no need to worry it holds the hook securely upright.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my neighbor. The Shepard hooks are heavy duty, nice and tall to be able to hang lanterns, little birdhouses or plant at a height that compliments a beautiful garden.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy J

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: These hooks are heavy duty and well made. I ordered a dozen of them and am completely satisfied with the product and the service I received. If you want shepherd hooks, these are the ones.
customer_reviews.author: G. Smith

customer_reviews.title: and bird feeder shepards hooks.
customer_reviews.text: Nice hooks in one solid pole, not screwed together. Box was a little tattered but parts were there. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Gault

customer_reviews.title: Classy looking
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect! So much more classy looking than most of the ones you see around. I used it to put my beautiful little birdhouse I bought from Amazon. I just love it!! I'm going to put the other one in the backyard. Possibly hang a set of Chimes on it.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Better for hanging a plant on.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. The hummingbirds did not go to the feeders when they hung from the hook. They work better to hang a plant on.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Solid well made
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty very sturdy I just wish I got them taller.
customer_reviews.author: Shaina L.

customer_reviews.title: Solid Construction.
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction, nice product. Shipped quickly. Very satisfied. I used it to hang a fake hornet's nest (waspinator) to "scare away" wasps. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: JR
